column1: # Name: Do unmarried men and unmarried women have equal ownership rights to property? (Female)

# Definition: This question is designed to determine whether there are gender-based differences over property for unmarried men and unmarried women. Ownership rights as used here include the ability to manage, control, administer, access, encumber, receive, dispose of and transfer property;The answer is “Yes” when no specific legal restriction is applied to single women or men, based on gender, with regard to property;The answer is “No” when legal restrictions are applied to single women or men, based on gender, with regard to property.
# Source: World Bank, Women Business and the Law
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
